versions.summary: Reset screen overhaul with selectable reset options and modernized UI. Chat clear now resets Cortex files and cycle state. Session and persona deletion properly cleans up all related data (cycle state, persona notes). New reset_persona() in tier tracker. Documentation updates across README and test docs.

Update script overhaul: self-copy guard prevents mid-execution file corruption, PowerShell-based JSON version parsing, git reset --hard for clean updates, added frontend rebuild step (npm install + vite build) to ensure dist is up to date.

Cortex trigger fix: Resolved settings desync between frontend and backend, removed rebuild_cycle_base (was preventing first trigger), redesigned CortexUpdateIndicator (glass-morphism, no emoji), extended ContextBar with cortex progress display (C/X dual-bar), added progress API endpoint.
Complete frontend redesign with React SPA, Cortex memory system, and new onboarding flow.
Initial release of PersonaUI with basic chat, persona system, and prompt engine.
